amendment.description: Amendment establishes in the VA Department an known as the Office of Accountability and Whistelblower Protection.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 114-742 to add section 8, Office of Accountability and Whistleblower Protection to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A006) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Takano amendment (A006) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Takano.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A006) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
